socialSecurityDeathIndex

Class BeanDatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialSecurityDeathIndex.DatabaseConnection
      • socialSecurityDeathIndex.BeanDatabaseConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabaseConnection

    public final class BeanDatabaseConnection
extends DatabaseConnection
    Trivial, in-memory "database".
    Implements IDatabaseConnection to enable testing of methods and algorithms without requiring an actual database connection
    Author:
    Jim Vlcek

        RecordExists in class DatabaseConnection
        Parameters:
        drTarg - The death record whose existence is to be tested
